name: The Garden of Forking Paths
description:
A whimsical remake of the Borges short story, using Bitsy by Adam Le Doux. Explore the divergent paths of the endless, labyrinthine garden, while leafing through cut up fragments of the original tale, reconstructing new drafts in the process. Visit every such fragment to unearth the hidden centre!

It should be noted that this piece is not a game(!), and that there are no goals to attain or puzzles to solve. A typical playthrough may only be a few minutes - best experienced when in a contemplative mood.

Plays with sound.
